description:
Workouts and bus rides are better with a soundtrack. Enjoy Skullcandy’s signature sound profile and let the Dime 2 wireless earbuds make your commute sound better. Integrated Tile location tech means that if you misplace your earbuds, all you need to do is bring up the Tile app and track them down. And the compact carrying case doubles as a charger, giving you up to 12 hours of music, podcasts, and calls.

  • Tile™ location technology in each earbud, so if you lose one, you’ll be able to find it
  • Bluetooth® connectivity with up to 10m range
  • LED indicator light displays connection info and battery status
  • Integrated microphones for taking calls
  • Up to 3.5 hours of music or talk time, and the carrying case charges the earbuds for another 8.5 hours
  • Case charges via micro-USB
  • Compact case: 6.2 x 3.8cm
  • 3 sizes of comfortable silicone earpads to keep the earbuds anchored
  • IPX4 weather proofing protects these earbuds from a little rain or a lot of sweat. Note the case has no water protection
  • Integrated buttons let you answer calls and control your music
name: Skullcandy Dime 2 True Wireless Earbuds
